headline: Why We Gather: Hilton Reveals Behavioral, Emotional and Cultural Drivers Defining 2026 Meetings and Events
summary: MCLEAN, Va., January 20, 2026--As technology and artificial intelligence (AI) rapidly redefine how we connect, today’s most impactful meetings and events continue to be anchored in authentic, in-person moments that digital platforms can’t replicate. Today, Hilton introduces the Why We Gather Report, a new special section of its 2026 Trends Report, which explores the behavioral, emotional, and cultural shifts redefining how people are planning to connect in 2026 through meetings and events.
